text: Walter Buser (14 April 1926 - 17 August 2019) was a Swiss politician from the Social Democratic Party of Switzerland (SDP). He was born in Lausen, Switzerland. He defeated his opponents and became the first Social Democratic Chancellor of Switzerland serving from 1981 until his resignation in 1991. Buser died on 17 August 2019 at the age of 93.Ãˆ morto l'ex cancelliere federale Walter Buser ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Federal Chancellors of Switzerland Category:People from Basel-Landschaft
